description: Triangle of coefficients of generating function of ternary rooted trees of height at most n.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..8, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
maple: T:= proc(n) option remember; local f, g;      if n=0 then 1    else f:= z-> add([T(n-1)][i]*z^(i-1), i=1..nops([T(n-1)]));         g:= expand(1 +z*(f(z)^3/6 +f(z^2)*f(z)/2 +f(z^3)/3));         seq(coeff(g, z, i), i=0..degree(g, z))      fi    end:seq(T(n), n=0..5); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 26 2011
mathematica: T[n_] := T[n] = Module[{f, g}, If[n == 0, {1}, f[z_] = Sum[T[n-1][[i]]*z^(i-1), {i, 1, Length[T[n-1]]}]; g = Expand[1+z*(f[z]^3/6+f[z^2]*f[z]/2+f[z^3]/3)]; Table[Coefficient [g, z, i], {i, 0, Exponent[g, z]}]]]; Table[T[n], {n, 0, 5}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 10 2014, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Eric Rains (rains(AT)caltech.edu)
